## County Health Rankings & Roadmaps

|                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|------------|------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Description**         | Provides information on health outcomes and health factors for all 50 states                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| **Time Frame**          | Year; 2010 to 2024                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| **Spatial Scale**       | County                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| **Format**              | CSV and Shapefiles                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| **Source**              | Robert Wood Johnson Foundation and the University of Wisconsin Population Health Initiative                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| **Original Repository** | [2010 to 2022](https://www.countyhealthrankings.org/health-data/methodology-and-sources/data-documentation/national-data-documentation-2010-2022) [2023 or 2024](https://www.countyhealthrankings.org/health-data/methodology-and-sources/data-documentation)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| **Living Atlas**        | [2018](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=c2d611adace94b488bfbf280dd591a7c) [2019](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=4dc9f89d893b40cf85e4fd59e5a444f0) [2020](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=c514eddc6d584e85bc2f90be25305fc8) [2021](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=c736859b2e0849878023c58f31f77c30) [2022](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=3a684a0851e74ff1b55225dbdfde78b4) [2023](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=b103fc10c7524cecb17e5f3bbc7205f5) [2024](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=76246cfea2f346b99f39c038d39967a8) |

: {tbl-colwidths="\[20,80\]"}

**Details**\
This dataset offers county level estimates of health outcomes and risk factors. Estimates help identify ares requiring improvement and guide the creation and use of effective, focused health interventions. As a result of the difficulty in finding local intervention effects, users should be careful when using these figures to judge programs or policies.
